competitive_gaps: Educational content about window technology and materials - most companies focus on selling, not educating about Low-E coatings, gas fills, spacer systems
Long-term cost of ownership calculators - competitors show upfront costs but rarely break down 20-year total cost including maintenance and energy
Installation process transparency - very few companies show behind-the-scenes of proper installation techniques, creating trust gap
Climate-specific recommendations - generic content doesn't address regional differences (hurricane zones, extreme cold, high altitude UV)
Window maintenance and care guides - opportunity to stay engaged with customers post-installation with helpful content
Comparison content between window types - customers struggle to understand vinyl vs. wood vs. fiberglass differences
Financing education - most just advertise 'financing available' without explaining options, credit requirements, or true costs
DIY troubleshooting content - helping homeowners identify if repair vs. replacement is needed builds trust even if they don't buy immediately
